Articles.Content:
So, I accepted a mission called "Help a scientist perform experiments at Minmus's Lesser Flats" involving taking a scientist to a marked position and then doing certain science experiments.

One of the experiments is "Experiment: Plant growth study" but I have no idea how to run this experiment. There are no science parts in the VAB which allows this kind of science. I downloaded the Station Science add on and tried taking the plant study module to the site along with a lab and accumulating Eurekas and all that stuff to run the experiment. Still it doesn't work.

Can anyone help please.

Moving to Gameplay Questions.

(Technical support is for "game doesn't work", rather than "how do I X?")

From the Station Science mod thread:

Quote

Plant Growth: see how a variety of plants grow in space. All you need is a crewed Science Lab.

You should only need a "Science Lab" part (I don't think it's the same as the stock one) and maybe a scientist (I'm not familiar with this mod).

If you think this is a bug with the mod, you can try asking the author in the release thread here:

Maybe you need the Mod Planetary Base Systems:

Option is exactly named "Experiment: Plant growth study"

 

Edit: There is also a part named K&K Greenhouse container - lower costs, weight and its earlier resarched. It allows the same study.

 

Both give sciencepoints. (~50 SP landed at Minmus? dunno exactly)

Edited March 30, 2017 by Draalo
added info

Gaarst - thanks for the research on this. I actually tried this but I suspected that it wasn't about station science as originally I didn't have that mod installed. I only installed it after arriving once on Minmus and finding that the scientist wouldn't just do it themselves. So I downloaded station science, used the lab as you indicated and ran the experiment (successfully) but this didn't achieve the requirement.

 

Draalo - now I did have PBS installed so I shall try that. Thanks for the help.

Thanks to both of you.
